alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 7:58PM EDT until August 12 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LITCHFIELD AND CENTRAL DUTCHESS COUNTIES... At 757 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ancram to near Litchfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Hyde Park, Pleasant Valley, Amenia, Kent, Pine Plains, Millbrook, Fairview, Red Oaks Mill, Stanfordville, Staatsburg, Dover Plains, Beekman, Bethel, Smithfield, Salt Point, Norrie Heights, South Dover, Lithgow and Hoxie Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
